Instrument_PDS3.instrument_desc: Instrument Overview =================== Ephemeris information for the Lunar Prospector (LP) spacecraft was obtained by the project spacecraft tracking system, which consisted of a communication system on the spacecraft and the NASA Deep Space Network (DSN). Spacecraft spin rate and attitude information were derived from onboard sun and limb crossing sensors. Commands uplinked to the spacecraft were sent through the tracking and communication system. The LP spacecraft communication system consisted of an S-band transponder, an omni antenna with 3-pi steradian antenna pattern for uplink and downlink, and a medium gain antenna for downlink. The engineering-only downlink data rate was 300 bps and the science/engineering downlink data rate was 3600 bps [BINDERETAL1998].
